review: For Netflix viewing, it is excellent. Far better than my no longer working Roku 3.  You can't beat the price.
author: toan

review: This is my second Chromecast... my first one crapped out on me and Amazon replaced it very quickly.. two extra points for Amazon!!  The Chromecast is a cool little item and when it works... it's great and I really like it a lot.  It's a slick item, it's a cheap price and I've recommended it to my buddies for watching Youtube or Movies via computer or phone onto your big screen TV. The best part is that you can take it along when you travel...
author: FZ

review: Worth every penny! Streaming content smooth like a butter. I like that you can still do other things while streaming.
author: DS

review: Let me start by saying I have the fastest Internet speed available, a new iPhone and a gaming laptop with 8GB of RAM.Don't even TRY to browse the WEB. It ain't happening. Well, you can,  but, be warned. You CAN NOT "Cast" web browser from ANY Mobile OS device.  So get out the laptop and travel back to 1995 and watch web videos on 56k dial up modem, because that's EXACTLY what it's like. So forget YouTube. As for its Netflix App? It won't pause, and you could cook and eat a meal while you're waiting for it to load, but thats after its frozen and been reset 10 times. So to make a long story longer.... I returned it. Don't wast your time (a lot of time) and frustration. Take that $35. and the family out to Panda Express.
author: Dawn

review: Chromecast is very easy to set up and works great! I was watching videos within 5 minutes. Just got it today and am still "playing" with it, but so far its pretty cool. Very happy with my purchase so far.
